transArray.content:
The service is very good. The room facilities are complete. There is a heated toilet and a Xiaodu smart machine. It is very convenient to cast the screen to watch TV. The front desk staff has a good attitude and is very considerate in helping me solve the problem. Thank you very much. I will come back next time. of.
Facilities: great

The hotel's reply: We hope that when you come here, it will bring you a relaxed and comfortable environment. We will use the most enthusiastic service to let you experience the warmth of home. We look forward to your visit!
